channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for NJ
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for NJ

item.title: Report E-2025010048
item.description:
Report E-2025010048

Identified by scraper @ 2025-01-07T18:25:48+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-12-09
  • City: EAST BRUNSWICK
  • State: NJ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS, LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: XPO, XSD called in to report a 1-quart spill of UN1133 "White Polyester Adhesive" from a 55-gallon metal drum caused by a forklift puncture. The release impacted plastic wrap and a cardboard panel on the pallet which were already placed into an overpack with the damaged prior to XPO calling ERTS. ERTS advised the caller to reach out to ERTS first before handling a release.
